nodes.name: updateContract

updateContract(address,string,string).details: If the value of _delegate is zero then the functions specified  in _functionSignatures are removed.  If the value of _delegate is a delegate contract address then the functions  specified in _functionSignatures will be delegated to that address.

params._commitMessage: A short description of the change and why it is made        This message is passed to the CommitMessage event.
params._delegate: The address of a delegate contract to delegate to or zero
params._functionSignatures: A list of function signatures listed one after the other
